# Hanzo AI

> Frontier AI company building LLMs, AI cloud infrastructure, and agent frameworks.

## About
Hanzo AI (Techstars '17) builds frontier AI models, cloud infrastructure, and developer tools for AI-native applications. The platform provides foundation models (30+ Zen open-source models), an AI cloud platform, Model Context Protocol (MCP) infrastructure, agent frameworks, and blockchain infrastructure APIs supporting 100+ chains. Products include Hanzo Dev (AI coding assistant), AI Studio, and a comprehensive Cloud Platform.

## Key Features
- 30+ Zen open-source foundation models (qwen3+ architecture)
- Hanzo Dev: AI-powered coding assistant with MCP integration
- AI Studio: Train, fine-tune, and deploy models
- Cloud Platform: Managed AI infrastructure with GPU clusters
- Model Context Protocol (MCP): Open protocol for AI context management
- Agent frameworks for building autonomous AI systems
- Blockchain infrastructure APIs: nodes, wallets, webhooks, data APIs
- Support for 100+ blockchain networks
- Enterprise-grade security and compliance

## API
- Base URL: https://api.hanzo.ai
- Authentication: API key via Bearer token
- Docs: https://docs.hanzo.ai/api
